column1: Subject: Introduction ‚Äì Elgars Abolins (Magebit) & Andras Tar (iSTYLE)

I‚Äôd like to introduce you to Elgars Abolins  our Account Manager at Magebit. Magebit has been a trusted partner for us on Magento  consistently delivering great results  and we truly value our collaboration with them.

Currently  Magebit is developing a payment plugin for Shopify tailored to our needs. As this solution is of great importance to both Leanpay and iSTYLE  they have assured us of a quick delivery to ensure a smooth and efficient rollout. Additionally  Magebit has experience launching payment apps on Shopify  which gives us confidence in their ability to deliver a reliable and effective solution.
Elgars  Andras is the Regional Manager at iSTYLE  and I believe this connection will be valuable for both of you.
UK office | 9th Floor  107 Cheapside  EC2V 6DN  London  UK
